General.Name: Zotye Automobile Co Ltd
General.Description: Zotye Automobile Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of automobiles in China, the United States, Algeria, Chile, Russia, and internationally. It offers cars, SUVs, MPVs, and new energy vehicles. The company also provides components, such as engines; transmission products; batteries; motors; electronic control products; and spare parts, as well as support services. It exports its products to Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, the United Arab Emirates, Mongolia, Bolivia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Anhui Zotye Automobile Co., Ltd and changed its name to Zotye Automobile Co., Ltd in November 2017. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Jinhua, China.
